title: Deutsche Bank Shows the Long Road Ahead for Credit Suisse
sub_head: Persistent investor skepticism toward the German lender’s recovery underlines the challenge facing Credit Suisse to rebuild trust
body:
Credit Suisse has become a European banking basket case. Deutsche Bank ’s ongoing recovery from a similar position shows how hard the rehabilitation process is.
Dismal first-quarter results from the beleaguered Swiss lender disappointed already low expectations that had been adjusted for a profit warning only days earlier. However, another raft of senior management changes seems to have placated investors as its shares traded flat.
